Everything from this point forward is entirely in God's hands, and I have complete faith in him.

Student loan forgiveness is an affront to our most basic values and should never be entertained as a serious policy proposal.

This also means having strong values and being a person of high character for your community.

A responsible Oklahoman would never take out tens of thousands of dollars in loans and demand that he shouldn't have to repay them.

Rural Oklahomans have a deep appreciation for personal responsibility.

This means taking ownership of your home, your livelihood, and your family.
